New York University Abu Dhabi Library
Tunisia Travel on the Kairouan AD.MC.043
107 Photographic Prints 107 gelatin silver photographs contained within an album measuring 36 x 25 cm
Circa 1951 Excellent condition. No tears or foxing.
Content Description
A travel album of Tunisia containing 107 gelatin silver photographs. The places visited are: Tunis, Carthage, Sidi Bou Said, Nabeul, Hammamet, Monastie, Mahdia, Sousse,El Djem, Gabes, Sfax, Matmatas, Douirot, Djerba, Gafsa, Medenine and Kairouan.
Tunisia Architecture Regional/National Dress Photographic Prints
